name: Idle Together
description:
Description

Both left and right work together to fight monsters in order to progress to the next stage.

If either of your fighters die, they become separated! They will fight alone until they both are able to progress to the next level.

Controls

S - Save the game

R - Rebirth (available after monster level 30, must also be joined together)

More Info

Click the swords button to perform a manual attack for your fighters.

You can upgrade your fighter's health, strength and speed.

Every 10 levels you fight a boss enemy.
